hero.title: Unlock insights into video and consumer intent with Samba AI.
hero.text: Videos processed in the last 24 hours

leaderboard.subtext: We index everything across linear and streaming video - in real-time.

semasio.headline: With the acquisition of Semasio, Samba now catalogs linear TV, Streaming services and the Open Web
semasio.subtext: Our AI models uniquely integrate Consumer Intent with Contextual Relevance, across video and digital media

video.text:
See what Samba AI Sees:
Every scene, every moment, every brand
Extremely accurate, actionable and valuable data with global scale
video.subtext: Samba has led the industry for years by live-decoding video with our pioneering content recognition technology, and now Samba AI has a deeper unprecedented understanding of video context.

layers.headline: Samba AI Captures Attention and Intention
layers.subtext: We map what people watch with what they browse on the web.

track.headline: Track every ad, across every market, while it's happening
track.subtext: No one knows video advertising like Samba, our actionable insights and statistics help you put your message in just the right place.
